plot: A young, gay filmmaker takes us inside his experience of being exposed to HIV. He retells the story with the use of surreal images and an audio recording as he receives his test results.
title: Tested
plot_es: A young, gay filmmaker takes us inside his experience of being exposed to HIV. He retells the story with the use of surreal images and an audio recording as he receives his test results.
plot_en: A young, gay filmmaker takes us inside his experience of being exposed to HIV. He retells the story with the use of surreal images and an audio recording as he receives his test results.
